Custom images should be square (same width and height) and width and height should not be larger than 1000px. The background should be transparent and the clock hands should be centered and pointing upwards.
Use Custom Color For Seconds Hand
Use Custom Color For Hour And Minutes Hand
Use Custom Color For Clock Face
Hint: Press OK or MENU button to enter settings.
This app is Open Source. If you want to improve the app or its translations, please check out the repository on Github.
You have previously denied calendar access. Please go to the Android settings and manually grant calendar access for this app.

Important notice for FireTV devices: Amazon FireOS does not officially allow changing the system screensaver to a 3rd party app, but there is a workaround possible using the developer tools. Details are explained in the Github repo (see below). Without the workaround, the clock can still be started on FireTV devices like a normal app.
No web browser found to open this URL
Set as screensaver in Android settings…
This device does not support Android screensavers.
Could not fetch current prices for in-app purchases.
Force landscape view (only when started manually)
Burn-in prevention (for OLED screens; moves content slightly)
You can use the following placeholders (example in brackets)

G - Era designator (AD)
 yyyy or yy - Year (2024 or 24)
 MM or MMM or MMMM - Month (12 or Dec or December)
 ww - Week in year (27)
 W - Week in month (2)
 DDD - Day in year (189)
 d or dd - Day in month (1 or 01)
 F - Day of week in month (2)
 EEEE or E - Week day name (Monday or Mon.)
 u - Day number of week (1-7)
 a - AM/PM marker
 HH - Hour in day (0-23)
 hh - Hour in AM/PM (1-12)
 mm - Minute in hour
 ss - Second in minute
 zzzz or z - Time zone name (Pacific Standard Time or PST)
 Z - RFC 822 time zone (-0800)
 XXX or X - RFC 8601 time zone (-08:00 or -08)

 Custom text can be added in single quotes, e.g. 'your text'.
Attention: you have \'High Contrast Text\' enabled in the Android system accessibility settings. This will destroy the digital clock design. Please disable this setting for a proper user experience.
